response.overview: Nastya writes plays. She buys a notebook and desperately "creates". Her play is liked by a fashionable director. At the reading, N. meets Egor, and they have a short connection. After that, she begins to doubt her creativity. At the rehearsal, N. meets Aglaya, a crazy girl, and falls head over heels in love with her. They have a strange relationship, similar to stills from movies. And then Ag. just disappears, and N. searches in vain for her in the city. At the premiere, Nastya realizes that she is ready to start a new creative round. I need a new notebook.
response.title: A Speck
